channel.title: Need help Im a noob
channel.description:
Hi people
Since the mod is coming out soon I want to make sure I'm ready to play it
It says here I need Source SDK 2007 and its free and I don't have to buy any games to get it.
But how do I get it? (No Im not trolling) Do I need to have Steam? Can I get Source Sdk 2007 without steam? I don't Need to buy any steam games?
I'm a noob when it comes to PC being a console gamer for most of my Life
I first played Half Life 1 when it came out on PS2 when I was a little kid and Liked it
Now I hear Half Life 1 is back with New HD Graphics so I want to play it again
From the Pics and Vids I seen it look like Valve made it I almost Thought they did for a bit lol.
Anyways If anyone can Answer this extremly noob Question Thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: Need help Im a noob
item.dc:creator: nowayintheday92
item.description:
acade365:

  1. You need Steam.

  2. In Steam, you need to go to Library > Tools > Source SDK Base 2007, and download it. It’s free.

Thanks
